scene_desc: Epic high fantasy landscape, a majestic dragon with shimmering golden scales soaring above a misty valley towards a distant, ancient castle. Cinematic lighting, dramatic clouds, detailed feathers and scales.
motion_desc: Smooth, slow, soaring flight, slight wing flaps.

t2i_params.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, cartoon, watermark, text, deformed

scene_desc: A vibrant cyberpunk cityscape at night. Rain-slicked streets reflect neon signs. Flying vehicles zoom between towering skyscrapers. Dense, atmospheric, Blade Runner style.
motion_desc: Fast-paced traffic, camera panning slightly upwards.
